name: Fool's Mate (aslant)
description:
Fool's Mate is a tower defense game played with chess pieces. Try to survive as many waves as possible. You can place the pieces by selecting them from the lower left corner. It is recommended to play the game full screen. 
  • Queens move diagonally, horizontally, or vertically
  • Rooks move horizontally or vertically
  • Bishops move diagonally
  • Knights in an ‘L’ shape’
